verses.text: \w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Pharaoh \w and|strong="H4872"\w* tell \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* says: ‘\w Let|strong="H5186"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* people \w go|strong="H5927"\w*, \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* worship \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w But|strong="H4325"\w* if \w you|strong="H5921"\w* refuse \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w let|strong="H5186"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* plague \w your|strong="H5921"\w* whole country \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* Nile \w will|strong="H4714"\w* teem \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* palace \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* bedroom \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w onto|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* bed, \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* houses \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* officials \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* people, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* ovens \w and|strong="H4714"\w* kneading bowls.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w up|strong="H4480"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* officials.’”

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “Tell Aaron, ‘Stretch \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* hand \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* staff \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w canals|strong="H2975"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* ponds, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w cause|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w onto|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Egypt.’”

\w So|strong="H4616"\w* Aaron stretched \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* waters \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* frogs \w came|strong="H3068"\w* up \w and|strong="H3068"\w* covered \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt.

\w But|strong="H7535"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* magicians \w did|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w same|strong="H4480"\w* thing \w by|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H5493"\w* magic arts, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w also|strong="H5971"\w* \w brought|strong="H5493"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w up|strong="H4480"\w* onto \w the|strong="H4480"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Egypt.

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w summoned|strong="H6817"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “Pray \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w take|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* people. \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* people \w go|strong="H3318"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Pharaoh, “\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* honor \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*. \w When|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* pray \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* officials \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* people \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* (except \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* Nile) \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w taken|strong="H6213"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*?”
“Tomorrow,” Pharaoh answered. “May it be as you say,” Moses replied, “so that you may know that there is no one like the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* our God.

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* frogs \w will|strong="H3068"\w* depart \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* houses \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* officials \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w remain|strong="H1961"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Nile.”

\w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H1961"\w* Pharaoh, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* cried \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w help|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* frogs \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H4872"\w* \w against|strong="H4714"\w* Pharaoh.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* Moses requested, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* frogs \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* houses, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* courtyards, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fields died.

\w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* piled \w into|strong="H6213"\w* countless heaps, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w terrible|strong="H6213"\w* stench \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land.

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* saw \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* relief, \w however|strong="H8085"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron, \w just|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “Tell Aaron, ‘\w Stretch|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* staff \w and|strong="H4872"\w* strike \w the|strong="H6440"\w* dust \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H1242"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H5971"\w* \w into|strong="H3318"\w* swarms \w of|strong="H3068"\w* gnats \w throughout|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt.’”

\w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w did|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* Aaron \w stretched|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* hand \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* staff \w and|strong="H7971"\w* struck \w the|strong="H5921"\w* dust \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth, gnats \w came|strong="H5971"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* man \w and|strong="H7971"\w* beast. \w All|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* dust \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w turned|strong="H1004"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* gnats \w throughout|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4713"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* magicians tried \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w produce|strong="H1961"\w* gnats using \w their|strong="H3068"\w* magic arts, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* gnats \w remained|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* beast.

“\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* finger \w of|strong="H5971"\w* God,” \w the|strong="H7760"\w* magicians said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Pharaoh. \w But|strong="H1961"\w* Pharaoh’s heart \w was|strong="H1961"\w* hardened, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H5971"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* listen \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w*, \w just|strong="H2088"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* said.

\w Then|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Moses, “\w Get|strong="H6213"\w* \w up|strong="H6213"\w* early \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* morning, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w goes|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* water, stand \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* says: ‘\w Let|strong="H3651"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* people \w go|strong="H3068"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w worship|strong="H3651"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*.

But if \w you|strong="H7121"\w* \w will|strong="H6547"\w* \w not|strong="H3212"\w* \w let|strong="H3212"\w* \w My|strong="H7121"\w* people \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w I|strong="H3212"\w* \w will|strong="H6547"\w* send swarms \w of|strong="H7121"\w* flies \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H7121"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w your|strong="H7121"\w* officials \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w your|strong="H7121"\w* people \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w your|strong="H7121"\w* houses. \w The|strong="H7121"\w* houses \w of|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* Egyptians \w and|strong="H4872"\w* even \w the|strong="H7121"\w* ground where \w they|strong="H7121"\w* stand \w will|strong="H6547"\w* be full \w of|strong="H7121"\w* flies.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H4872"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H6213"\w* special treatment \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Goshen, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* live; \w no|strong="H3808"\w* swarms \w of|strong="H3068"\w* flies \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w*. \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w way|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* know \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* distinction between \w My|strong="H3068"\w* people \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* people. \w This|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3212"\w* place tomorrow.’”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H7971"\w*. Thick swarms \w of|strong="H3068"\w* flies poured \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s palace \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* houses \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* officials. Throughout Egypt \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w was|strong="H3068"\w* ruined \w by|strong="H3068"\w* swarms \w of|strong="H3068"\w* flies.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* summoned \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3318"\w*, \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w within|strong="H5973"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* land.”

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* replied, “\w It|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3318"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sacrifices \w we|strong="H3068"\w* offer \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* detestable \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Egyptians. If \w we|strong="H3068"\w* offer sacrifices \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* detestable \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Egyptians, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3318"\w* stone us?

\w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* three-day journey \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* wilderness \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w commands|strong="H1697"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*.”

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* answered, “\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3513"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* wilderness, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w must|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w very|strong="H1571"\w* far. \w Now|strong="H6471"\w* pray \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.”

“As soon as I leave you,” Moses said, “I will pray to the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, so that tomorrow the swarms of flies will depart from Pharaoh and his officials and his people. But Pharaoh must not act deceitfully again by refusing to let the people go and sacrifice to the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”
Then Moses left Pharaoh and prayed to the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,
and the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* did as Moses requested. He removed the swarms of flies from Pharaoh and his officials and his people; not one fly remained.
But Pharaoh hardened his heart this time as well, and he would not let the people go.
